articles.author: Shuvaditya Bose
articles.title: India vs Lebanon SAFF Championship 2023 Updates: India Win On Penalties - The Quint
articles.description: India vs Lebanon (IND vs LBN) Semi-Final Match South Asian Football Federation (SAFF) Championship 2023 Updates: India defeated Lebanon in the semi-final of SAFF Championship 2023. The Blue Tigers secured a 4-2 win in the penalty shootout.
articles.content:
Penalties. India to take first.
IND 1-0 LBN. Sunil Chhetri scores.
IND 1-0 LBN. Hassan Maatouk misses. Save from Gurpreet.
SREE KANTEERAVA ERUPTS IN JUBILATION!
IND 2-0 LBN. Anwar Ali scores.
IN… [+190 chars]
